description.en: KING OF DEFI is a digital finance project base on the TRON Blockchain.It gives user the ability to Stake, Lend and Governance capabilities.KODX is a decentralize finance aggregation protocol that delivers a diverse range of staking and lending products all at once. KODX would be put up as collateral to borrow stable coin Such as TRC20-USDT, USDJ.
